text.section:
Sec. 11-23.2. Bailiff for Grand Jury.
The Grand Jury of Miami-Dade County, Florida, may employ a Bailiff who shall serve at the pleasure of the Grand Jury and who shall be appointed pursuant to the provisions of Section 1 of Chapter 30165, Acts of 1955, Laws of Florida, and shall perform the duties and functions imposed by law and as may be prescribed by the Grand Jury. Such Bailiff shall serve under the order and direction of the Grand Jury.
